value.title: StarCraft 2: TOP LEVEL STARCRAFT - Dark vs Cure! (Zerg vs Terran)
value.excerpt: Very good game of professional StarCraft 2 between Dark (Zerg) and Cure (Terran). A wide variety of unit compositions is played in this epic match of SC2. value.title: StarCraft 2: Trap's COLOSSUS DROP Versus ByuN!
value.excerpt: It doesn't get much higher level than ByuN versus Trap when it comes to the Terran versus Protoss matchup in StarCraft 2. In this best-of-3 series we see a variety of strategies and approaches to the game.  Support my work on Patreon: http://www.patreon.com/lowkotv Become a YouTube member: https://lowko.tv/join

value.title: StarCraft 2: Very STRANGE Terran Strategies! (Serral vs GuMiho)
value.excerpt: A fun best-of-3 series of professional StarCraft 2 between Serral (Zerg) and GuMiho (Terran). At this point I am fairly certain that GuMiho plays a different strategy in every game he plays. In this best-of-3 series he decides to play Mech, cheesy Marines and a very strange Bio based opener.   Vanya

value.title: StarCraft 2: Who's The BEST TERRAN Currently?! (Maru vs Clem)
value.excerpt: Maru versus Clem in a best-of-3 series of professional StarCraft 2. Maru is the best Terran player from South Korea, and Clem is the best Terran player outside of South Korea... But who's the best?  Support my work on Patreon: http://www.patreon.com/lowkotv Become a YouTube member: https://lowko.tv/join

value.title: StarCraft 2: WIDOW MINE HEROES! (Clem vs ShoWTimE)
value.excerpt: Clem versus ShoWTimE in a best-of-5 series of professional StarCraft 2. A great series between two of the best pro gamers in SC2.
